description: Try our easy to follow Warm Mediterranean Chicken Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Warm Mediterranean Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425 g no added salt chickpeas, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange lettuce on a serving platter. Spoon over chickpea mixture. Top with chicken and drizzle over remaining dressing. Serve.
